cards.title: Impulse
powers: Play a track card, then return a track card to your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero target may gain 2 HP now.
One villain target does -1 damage until your next turn.
setup: This is the setup text for Impulse.
gameplay: This is the gameplay text for Impulse.

cards.title: Serrated Vinyl Slash
cards.body: {SFDDImpulse} deals 1 target 3 projectile damage. If this destroys the target, Impulse deals 1 target 2 sonic damage.

cards.title: Light, Smoke, and Mirrors
cards.body: {SFDDImpulse} deals 1 villain target X damage, where X is the number of environment cards in play.

cards.title: Record Scratch
cards.body: {SFDDImpulse} deals up to X targets 2 sonic damage, where X is the number of tracks in your hand.

cards.title: Breakdown
cards.body: Villain target deals 2 less damage until the start of {SFDDImpulse}'s next turn.

cards.title: Downtempo Shift
cards.body: Target player may draw 2 cards and discard 1 card.

cards.title: Accoustic Deadzone
cards.body: Attach to target. Attached card is exempt from all effects that target more than 1 card.

cards.title: Phase Modulator
cards.body: At the start of the villain turn, choose a villain target with 4 HP or less to skip their turn.

cards.title: Triple Deck Turntable
cards.body: Power: Play 2 track cards, then remove all track cards from play.

cards.title: Super Max Hi-Fi
cards.body: When {SFDDImpulse} deals Sonic damage, deal 1 additional target X sonic damage, where X is the number of track cards in your trash.

cards.title: Sonic Soothe
cards.body: At the start of your turn, hero target heals 2 HP. If {SFDDImpulse} would take damage, discard this card instead.

cards.title: Dancefloor Dirge
cards.body: When this track enters play, draw a card. If that card is a one-shot, you may play it. At the start of your turn, {SFDDImpulse} may deal 1 target 2 melee damage.

cards.title: Limbic Overdrive
cards.body: The first time a hero takes damage since the start of your turn, they may play a card. When this card leaves play, each hero may draw a card.

cards.title: Buld Up to the Drop
cards.body: At the start of your turn, add 1 build up counter to this track. Whis card leaves play, l deal up to 3 targets X sonic damage, where X is the number of build up counters on this track.

cards.title: 200 Beatdowns Per Minute
cards.body: When this track enters play, Impulse deals each non-hero target 2 sonic damage. At the start of your turn, draw a card.

cards.title: Reverb Distortion
cards.body: When this card enters your hand, Impulse deals 1 non-Hero target 2 sonic damage. At the start of your turn, deal 1 sonic damage to 2 non-hero targets.
